        Listen for both events and commands.
        Specified by:
        setEventListener in interface IAsyncApplicationClient
        Parameters:
        deviceType - if not null, then restrict subscription to devices of the given type.
        deviceID - if not null and deviceType is not null, then further restrict subscriptions to this device.
        l - the listener to call
